mdRecord.dcterms:title: Farm report, work done on the Mount Vernon farms during the week 8-14 August 1790.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, George Augustine, approximately 1759-1793
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Report of work done on each farm during the week, including report of amount of grain ground at mill, sickness among negroes, increase and decrease in cattle, work of ditchers. Autograph document, in hand of G. A. Washington, docketed by G. W. "From Maj. Geo. A. Washington 20th Aug. 1790," docketed in another hand "Report Aug. 1790 Mt. Vernon," laminated, watermark (F. Hayes & crown over encircled heraldic device). | Papers of George Washington - Reel#5
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Farm management
Weather
